title: Raja Enbar Mandhiri Enbar Lyrics Bhuvana Oru Kelvi Kuri
stanzas: <div>Raja Enbar Mandhiri Enbar Lyrics Bhuvana Oru Kelvi Kuri

Raja enbar mandhiri enbar
raajiyam illai aala
oru raaniyum illai vazha
oru uravum illai
adhil pirivum illai

Raja enbar mandhiri enbar
raajiyam illai aala
oru raaniyum illai vazha

Kallukkul eeram illai
nenjukkum irakkam illai
aasaikku vetkam illai
anubavikka yogam illai (2)

paithiyam theera
vaithiyam illai
ulagil enakku
oru vazhi illai.

Raja enbar mandhiri enbar
raajiyam illai aala
oru raaniyum illai vazha

nilavukku vaanam undu
Malarukku vaasam undu
kodikoru kilaiyum undu
enakendru enna undu(2)

raja enbaen
mandhiri enbaen
raajiyam unaku undu
oru rajakumaran undu

nal uravum undu
adhil parivu undu
andharathil oonjal
aaduvathen naalum

dheivathai unnil kanden
thinam thinam poojai seithen
nilavuku kalangam endru
uravuku vilagi nindren

raja enbaen
mandhiri enbaen
raajiyam unaku undu
oru rajakumaran undu

nal uravum undu
adhil parivu undu
andharathil oonjal
aaduvathen naalum
